title: Inclusive Curriculum Design for Gifted Boys to Understand Self-Awareness and Gender Influence

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: A course for professional learners in medical/legal/technical fields exploring self-awareness formation mechanisms in gifted male students within social contexts, requiring individual digital device usage

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the self-perception development process of gifted boys by applying Marsh’s framework of standards theory.
Learners can design inclusive curricula evaluating the impact of gender and ability perceptions on gifted education.
Learners can construct learner-engaged spaces using PBL methods to produce project outcomes reflecting diverse social perspectives.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
